attributes.action: Protect and Restore the situation in Afghanistan and remove the Taliban.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK as one of the largest leaders and defenders of the free world must respond ! As a UK citizen I believe our country must support  intervention to protect and restore the situation in Afghanistan

No one should be under any illusion of the outcome of this current situation. Young girls subjected to rape, Women mutilated and men murdered.

The UK must at this point come together. Regardless of Political/Financial bias there is no situation that this this current circumstance can be tolerated
attributes.background: I express my deep concerns on the way the situation is developing in Afghanistan. There could be different positions of opinion if this situation could be avoided, but the fact remains that we are now seeing the unacceptable circumstances that the UK must not ignore.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Help the people of Afghanistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823
